Package io.github.shooter.game

Class Player

java.lang.Object
io.github.shooter.game.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class represents the player character in the game. Handles movement, shooting, health, respawning, and rendering.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(float x, float y, float radius)
    Creates a new player at the specified position with given size.
    Player(float x, float y, float radius, String username)
    Same as other constructor but lets you set the username.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(float x, float y, float radius)
      Creates a new player at the specified position with given size.
      Parameters:
      x - initial x position
      y - initial y position
      radius - size of the player's hitbox

    • Player

      public Player(float x, float y, float radius, String username)
      Same as other constructor but lets you set the username.
      Parameters:
      x - initial x position
      y - initial y position
      radius - size of the player's hitbox
      username - player's display name

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(float delta, float screenW, float screenH, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle> obstacles)
      Update player's position and gun state. Also prevents the player from moving through obstacles or off screen.
      Parameters:
      delta - time since last update (seconds)
      screenW - screen width (for boundary checks)
      screenH - screen height (for boundary checks)
      obstacles - obstacles to collide with

    • handleGunInput

      public void handleGunInput()
      Checks keyboard input for switching guns or reloading.

    • attemptToFire

      public boolean attemptToFire()
      Tries to fire the current gun if the player is alive.
      Returns:
      true if the gun fired successfully

    • fireAt

      public boolean fireAt(float dirX, float dirY)
      Alias for attemptToFire.
      Parameters:
      dirX - x direction of fire
      dirY - y direction of fire
      Returns:
      true if fired

    • switchToGun

      public void switchToGun(int index)
      Switches to a different gun by index.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the gun to switch to

      Parameters:

    • renderGunInfo

      public void renderGunInfo(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont font, float x, float y)
      Renders some info about the current gun.
      Parameters:
      batch - SpriteBatch to draw with
      font - BitmapFont used for drawing text
      x - X coordinate to start drawing at
      y - Y coordinate to start drawing at

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(float dmg)
      Apply damage to the player.
      Parameters:
      dmg - amount of damage to apply

    • respawn

      public void respawn(float w, float h, Map<Integer,?> otherPlayers, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle> obstacles)
      Respawns the player at a safe location away from other players.
      Parameters:
      w - width of the playable area
      h - height of the playable area
      otherPlayers - map of other players to avoid when spawning
      obstacles - array of obstacles to avoid spawning inside

    • respawn

      public void respawn(float w, float h, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle> obstacles)
      Helper method to respawn while handling edge cases.
      Parameters:
      w - width of playable area
      h - height of playable area
      obstacles - array of obstacles to avoid spawning inside

    • shouldRespawn

      public boolean shouldRespawn()
      Checks if it's time to respawn the player.
      Returns:
      true if the player is dead and the respawn delay has passed
